output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

# Load
bbb <- readRDS("bbb_for_EDA.rds")
```


# Univariate Relationships

## Histograms
```{r}
bbb %>% ggplot(aes(match_balls)) + geom_histogram(bins = 50)
```

```{r}
bbb %>% ggplot(aes(inn_balls)) + geom_histogram(bins = 50)
```

```{r}
bbb %>% ggplot(aes(team_score)) + geom_histogram(bins = 50)
```

```{r}
bbb %>% ggplot(aes(match_balls)) + geom_histogram()
```
